name: Fundwurx
description: For businesses that struggle to manage their Corporate Social Responsibility initiatives, Fundwurx provides an all-in-one solution to streamline operations and workflows, facilitate connections to nonprofits, and track social impact data in real-time.
one_liner: For businesses that struggle to manage their Corporate Social Responsibility initiatives, Fundwurx provides an all-in-one solution to streamline operations and workflows, facilitate connections to nonprofits, and track social impact data in real-time.
